intro: Gear up and survive the deadliest fishing grounds.
description:
Step into the world of commercial deep-sea fishing in Deadliest Deep Sea Catch Fishing Simulator. Buy your crab or lobster fishing license, prepare your boat with bait, traps, and fuel, then set sail to the open sea. Choose your fishing spot, deploy traps, and bring back a lucrative catch to sell.

Features:
• Purchase required fishing licenses for crabs and lobsters.
• Upgrade your boat’s performance technically to improve efficiency.
• Explore the marketplace to buy boats with different cargo capacities and stats.
• Strategically select your spawn point on the sea map before each trip.
• Manage resources: fuel, bait, traps, and licenses must be bought before each outing.
• Set traps from your boat, catch crustaceans, and sell your haul to earn money.

Master the art of deep-sea crustacean fishing, optimize your gear and boat, and build a thriving business on the open waters. Can you become the ultimate deep-sea fishing legend?
